attributes.action: Buy the full lot of the Tranche 3 Eurofighter Typhoon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the Government supports the engineering and manufacturing skills of the United Kingdom by purchasing the full Tranche 3 Eurofighter Typhoon lot.
This will enable the continuation of aviation related skills and technology for benifit of the UK and its allies
